summary: The diff implements multi-language support (English, Hindi, Marathi) with a LanguageContext, translations file, LanguageSwitcher component, and integration across multiple page components. The core infrastructure (REQ-29, REQ-30, REQ-31) appears well implemented. REQ-32 is partially implemented â€” several pages (Home, About, Techniques, Farm, Shop, Header, Footer) show t(key) usage, but Cattle, Equipment, Contact, GovernmentSchemes, Signup, and OtpVerification pages are not shown in the diff, leaving their translation coverage unverifiable. Some hardcoded English strings remain in pages that were modified (e.g., 'Organic Cultivation', '100% Organic & Sustainable', 'Organic Products' badge labels, organicBenefits array in Farm.tsx). The Footer also has a hardcoded English description string.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply t(key) translation function across ALL major page components including Cattle, Equipment, Contact, GovernmentSchemes, Signup, and OtpVerification
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows modifications to Home, About, Techniques, Farm, Shop, Header, and Footer. Pages Cattle, Equipment, Contact, GovernmentSchemes, Signup, and OtpVerification do not appear in the modified files list, so their translation integration is unverified.

missing_requirements.requirement: No hardcoded English strings remain in the major translated UI sections
missing_requirements.reason: Several hardcoded English strings remain in modified files: 'Organic Cultivation', '100% Organic & Sustainable' badge (Farm.tsx), 'Organic Products' badge (Shop.tsx), 'Our Story' badge (About.tsx), 'Sustainable Methods' badge (Techniques.tsx), organicBenefits array strings in Farm.tsx, and the brand tagline paragraph in Footer.tsx are hardcoded in English.
